item.title: Reporter's Notebook: GOP lawmakers prepare to slash $9.1B from USAID, NPR and PBS in rare vote
item.description: The House will vote on President Donald Trump's proposal canceling $9.1 billion in appropriations for public broadcasting and foreign aid.

item.title: Fate of Trump's $9.4 billion spending cut package hangs on House GOP moderates
item.description: President Trump's $9.4 billion spending cuts proposal faces uncertainty as moderate House Republicans express concerns about the measure.

item.title: Biden breakdown: Where investigations into the former president stand
item.description: Former President Joe Biden left office in January, but questions about his mental acuity and decline while in office continue to mount. Here's where t...

item.title: 'I call it a rebellion': Maxine Waters' history of enflaming crowds, from Rodney King to today
item.description: Throughout her long tenure in Congress, Rep. Maxine Waters has been a prominent and polarizing figure among Los Angeles unrest.

item.title: House bipartisan bill directs NSA to create 'AI security playbook' amid Chinese tech race
item.description: House lawmakers propose a bill requiring the NSA to develop an "AI security playbook" amid Chinese efforts to steal U.S. technology and information.
